transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hi sir Minashi.
Customer: Hi.
Executive: Hello. Hi sir Minashi from IndiaMART sir.
Customer: Ha tell me ma'am.
Executive: Uh sir very good afternoon. How are you doing sir?
Customer: Fine thank you.
Executive: Sir from my team Biba is already spoken with you sir.
Customer: Yes all all issues are sorted ma'am right now.
Executive: Yes sir I know that all the issue has been sorted but I need to reconnect you because frequently we receive the complaint na. So that's why I'm not able to close that request. So I I just reconnected you to take a confirmation on this.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Sir now Vyapar issue has been sorted?
Customer: Vyapar? You are calling from Vyapar?
Executive: IndiaMART.
Customer: Nahi nahi I'm calling from IndiaMART sir Minashi.
Customer: Okay okay done done okay sorry I didn't save your number. Okay Vyapar issue also sorted.
Executive: Ha.
Executive: Sir now what is what is the format of the inquiry buyleads calls kaise aa rahi hai? Did you get any maturity on that relevancy because you are just started with us. Any challenges apart this Vyapar or uh uh corrections you want anything?
Customer: Yeah I I have one request from Vyapar regarding as per my old invoice or my direct process. Uh so I have to connect again to the Vyapar team. Further my old invoice same to same can be possible or not sir. So I already give a reply to you in the WhatsApp na. I will connect I will connect again.
Executive: I already added with me on a WhatsApp so I give you reply that I give you reply ki sir last month data and before that data is we are not able to fetch on that. I already replied on this. Sir in that I know I am just asking about the buyleads inquiry how is how all is that?
Customer: Yes it's good. No issue.
Executive: Any leads till yet is in conversion?
Customer: No right now.
Executive: What the challenges you are facing while converting any pricing and the the buyers also posting sellers also posting as a buyer. If I contact to them they are offering product to us.
Customer: Aha.
Customer: Actually we are thinking he is buyer but they are not buyers they are also sellers. When I call back to them that as per they are telling no no I I have the product so I will ready to sell. So is the main challenge I'm facing right now maximum.
Executive: You know that.
Customer: Sellers also posting the requirement as a buyer only. That is the main challenge.
Customer: And the mostly traders are
Executive: reply the leads matlab if you need to reply on the not relevant leads to aap kaise kar sakte ho? Ye aapko pata hai sir?
Customer: No madam.
Executive: You don't know. Sir open on a buyleads.
Customer: Actually right one second one second. Can I do it on right now?
Executive: Yes yes sir you need to do it right now sir. I'm just suggesting you.
Customer: Sure sure sure.
Customer: Yeah I I open.
Executive: Theek hai. Go on a buyleads option.
Customer: Buyleads.
Executive: From where you purchasing the leads?
Customer: Last buyleads last buyleads lead manager.
Executive: In that 400 rupees account. In that you need to find the not relevant option delete sign. Delete sign is there in in front of Latest buyleads.
Customer: Ha. Oh yeah latest buyleads I have selected. That delete sign star mark and delete sign option is there?
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Ha. Whenever the any of the leads which are not related to your product then please mark those leads as a not not relevant. Theek hai? By checking the details of the buyer and the product information which you are getting on that.
Executive: Theek hai?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai? Anything anything else you want to discuss sir?
Customer: No nothing. Actually how to it is mentioned as a not relevant. How can I mention this?
Executive: Sir by clicking on that na there is three four options are coming there. You can check from there.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai?
Customer: There is a delete option when I selected the delete option then only you find the option category locations lead type order value right is all theek hai?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: I'm closing this request sir you got a feedback from my side. Please share your feedback.
Customer: Yes I will share a feedback.
Executive: Thank you so much. Take care sir. Bye sir.
Customer: Bye bye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know how to mark irrelevant buyleads.

- Facing issue with sellers posting as buyers.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to mark irrelevant buyleads.

- Executive confirmed Vyapar issue is resolved.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will share feedback.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, irrelevant leads, vyapar, sellers, buyers
